summary: Adjusts the flame to the correct height.
descriptionHtml:
I went to test out ewi65's new candle flame (very nice I might add) and realized I never got around to fixing the height on the Imperial candles. This is a vanilla bug that shipped with the game. So here is that long delayed fix.

Please see the images for comparison.

[b]NOTE: If you use RCI or SMIM, don't overwrite the impcandle01 mesh, as I just found out both of those already do this. You will only need to install the chandelier meshes from this.[/b]
If you don't use either of these two overhaul mods, then use this entire fix.

This effects the following meshes only:
impcandle01
impchandelliercandle02
impchandelliercandle03


Credits:
Candle meshes - Bethesda
Mesh Edits - Mr. Dave
author: Mr Dave
